name: 3M EM550GPS Wireless Optical Mouse
Features: The 3M Ergonomic Mouse has earned an Ease-of-Use Commendation from the Arthritis Foundation for its special, vertical grip design that keeps your hand and wrist at a neutral angle, while the mouse works as a regular optical mouse. Grip the handle and rest your hand on the base. Use your thumb to left and right click. Optical sensor, wireless, USB compatible plug and play.
